channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Bruxelles voudrait lever le pied sur l’AI Act pour ne pas fâcher Washington
item.description: Bruxelles pourrait mettre de l'eau dans le vin de l'AI Act, ce texte très ambitieux qui encadre l'intelligence artificielle dans l'Union européenne. Sous la pression de Washington et des géants du numérique, la Commission envisage d’en reporter certaines dispositions, quitte à assouplir temporairement la régulation la plus stricte au monde sur l’IA....

item.title: L’excellent Honor Magic 7 Pro sorti en 2025 est déjà à moitié prix grâce aux offres du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Lancé cette année, le Honor Magic 7 Pro a de sérieux atouts, le premier étant évidemment sa puce ultra-puissante à laquelle rien ne résiste. À l'approche du Black Friday, on trouve ce récent smartphone premium à 622,15 euros au lieu de 1 299 euros.

item.title: Le Black Friday liquide les stocks de smartphones : voici le meilleur des promos sur les iPhone d’Apple, Samsung Galaxy et Google Pixel
item.description: Le Black Friday est bien en avance cette année, et de tous les produits tech, ce sont les smartphones qui en profitent le plus. Samsung Galaxy, iPhone d'Apple, Google Pixel, Xiaomi Redmi, de l'entrée au haut de gamme, voyons ce que réservent les e-commerçants en ce début de Black November.

item.title: 9 Best Leggings of 2025, Tested and Reviewed by WIRED
item.description: Whether you’re doing ab crunches or pressing play on the next episode, these leggings are built for every kind of marathon.

item.title: The ultra-light Dyson V9 cordless vacuum just plummeted to less than half price, and it's not even Black Friday yet
item.description: This vacuum is nimble, lightweight, and absurdly cheap for a Dyson cordless.

item.title: Voici l’idée du patron de Renault pour rendre ses petites voitures électriques « 10 à 15 % » moins chères
item.description: À l'occasion du lancement de la Renault Twingo électrique, le PDG de la marque s'est confié sur l'évolution de la réglementation européenne, et comment elle pourrait aider à baisser les prix de ses voitures électriques.

item.title: The 65 best early Black Friday deals I've found so far – Amazon, Best Buy, Target, and more
item.description: Early Black Friday sales are live from your favorite retailers, and I'm rounding up today's best deals on appliances, TVs, Apple devices, vacuums, and gift ideas.

item.title: MrBeast Says He’s Launching a Theme Park in Saudi Arabia Next Week
item.description: "I made a game for people that like zip lines," the YouTuber wrote, describing one of the attractions.

item.title: Zach Cregger’s New Sci-Fi Film Has Hit a Wall at Netflix
item.description: Plus, the 'Doctor Who' spinoff 'War Between the Land and the Sea' wants to give a new name to the Sea Devils.

item.title: 6 Best Laptops for College Students (2025): Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The best college laptops are portable, come with great battery life, and have enough performance for schoolwork of any kind.

item.title: Monopods have come a long way, and the Sirui SVM-145P takes this simple camera support to new heights
item.description: The Sirui SVM-145P is a versatile and robust monopod with fast operation and an impressive maximum payload, making it ideal for photography and video.

item.title: Peugeot dévoile de nouvelles motos électriques ultra-stylées et on a pu monter dessus
item.description: Sur le stand de Peugeot Motocycles à Milan, DAB Motors attire tous les regards. Un an après la présentation de la DAB 1α, la marque bayonnaise revient avec une version scrambler, la 1αX. Nous l'avons approchée et rencontré Simon Dabadie, fondateur de la marque, pour en savoir plus.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra : design, écran, fenêtre de sortie, prix… Tout ce qu’on sait sur le futur smartphone
item.description: Le Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra approche petit à petit, voici tout ce que l'on sait déjà à son sujet (fenêtre de sortie, design, écran, performances, etc.).

item.title: Garmin is planning a Spotify Wrapped-style review of your fitness highlights in 2025
item.description: Garmin could be working on an annual summary to help you understand your health and fitness.

item.title: Best Noise-Canceling Headphones (2025): Sony, Bose, and More
item.description: Tune out (or rock out) with our favorite over-ears and earbuds.

item.title: ChatGPT attaqué pour « homicide involontaire » et « suicide assisté » aux États-Unis
item.description: ChatGPT est accusé d'être un « coach en suicide » : sept nouvelles plaintes ciblent l'agent conversationnel d'OpenAI aux États-Unis.

item.title: Amazon fait -32 % lors du pré-Black Friday sur ce SSD Crucial 2 To compatible PS5, avec dissipateur thermique inclus
item.description: C'est le produit phare pour quiconque veut booster la mémoire de son PC ou de sa PlayStation 5 Sony : le SSD Crucial T500 2 To passe de 205,99 euros à 139,14 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Fitbit is working on hypertension and ‘unusual trend' detection for Pixel Watch owners – here's how you can sign up for testing
item.description: Fitbit Labs is running tests for a new hypertension alert tool, and your can join the waitlist now.

item.title: What to Do in Dumbo If You’re Here for Business (2025)
item.description: The Big Apple has had a tech boom in the past few years—here’s where to stay, play, eat, and work in the city’s tech-dense Dumbo neighborhood.

item.title: How to Get Your Cat or Dog to Lose Weight—Experts Weigh In (2025)
item.description: Most household pets are overweight. I talked to experts to find the best ways to get your furry friend to shed a few pounds.

item.title: Tablet sales are on the rise - could they be the key to unlocking your productivity?
item.description: 40 million tablets were shipped in Q3 2025, with Lenovo devices playing a key role.

item.title: Sigourney Weaver Has an Optimistic Take on the Future of ‘Star Wars’
item.description: The 'Aliens' and 'Avatar' star joins 'Star Wars' in 2026's 'The Mandalorian and Grogu.'

item.title: Acer Predator Triton 14 AI Review: A Laptop for Gamers and Creators
item.description: This Acer laptop straddles the line between creators and gamers, and it mostly works.

item.title: The Polestar 4 takes EV minimalism to the next level
item.description: Since the launch of its Polestar 2 sedan in 2021, Swedish EV company Polestar has launched two additional models: the spacious 3 compact crossover SUV, and now the 4, a sporty, even more compact crossover SUV. The 4 slotting in between the 2 and 3 in size may confound some consumers, but one of its […]

item.title: The one job AI won’t replace is the spreadsheet guru
item.description: From their complex formulas to cryptic functions, spreadsheets are too damn hard. AI promises to change that. But here’s why go-to experts will live on. A decade ago, Ben Collins quit his job as a corporate accountant and started teaching other people how to use spreadsheets more effectively.

item.title: To maximize AI ROI, train employees to be AI-native
item.description: It’s not the tools themselves. It’s how you train your team to use them. The debate around AI ROI has gotten loud—and, frankly, a little cyclical. One moment, we’re hearing that AI is the key to exponential growth; the next, that 95% of AI pilots fail.

item.title: Google Gemini is now rolling out on Android Auto – here are the upgrades you get
item.description: It looks as though Gemini is now finally replacing Google Assistant on Android Auto, at least for some.

item.title: New Marvel report seems to confirm when the first Avengers: Doomsday trailer will drop – and it could be before the end of 2025
item.description: The release date for Avengers: Doomsday's first trailer has apparently been revealed.

item.title: AI Week
item.description: It's AI Week on TechRadar. Here are some exclusive articles that help you take your first steps with using AI and show you how to take it further.
